org.semanticweb.kaon2.extensionapi.jdbc
Interface DatabaseSpecifics

public interface DatabaseSpecifics

Represents the aspects of the implementation that are specific for a particular database.

                                              int[] columnTypes)
                                              throws KAON2Exception
Returns the SQL string for reating the table that contains bindings.

Appends a value to the buffer.

Throws:

getDriverClassName

java.lang.String getDriverClassName()
Returns the class name of the driver.

Returns:
the class name of the driver (if this is null, then driver must be specified in the mappnigs file)
